plot: Candide will not rest until he is reunited with his beloved Lady Cunegonde. During his search for her, he and Martin are thrust into the lavish and calculating labyrinth of upper class ...
title: Un gentilhomme à Paris
plot_es: Candide will not rest until he is reunited with his beloved Lady Cunegonde. During his search for her, he and Martin are thrust into the lavish and calculating labyrinth of upper class ...
plot_en: Candide will not rest until he is reunited with his beloved Lady Cunegonde. During his search for her, he and Martin are thrust into the lavish and calculating labyrinth of upper class ...
